pirateTurn() - Method in class DiceGame.DiceGameManager
calls to the DiceGame.PirateTurn to create a new pirate score based on the one input into the function then passes back to the players turn unless the pirate has reached the score threshold
PirateTurn(int) - Method in class me.charlie.Game.DiceGame
Pirates rolls the dice, if the roll is good, a random number between 0 and 0.99 is generated.
